How to restore original textures:
1. Goto: "C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\bin".
2. Open minecraft.jar with WinRAR.
3. Copy content of minecraft_original (not the entire folder) located in the same place to WinRAR window with opened minecraft.jar file (just ctrl+c/ctrl+v).
4. Click OK.

Buy this game, It's totally worth it!

@Arthonis: Extract it to C:\Documents and Settings\$USER$\Application Data

Original Textures are in 

/.minecraft
/bin
/minecraft_original

Move all the files into "minecraft.jar" in BIN Folder.

You can open "minecraft.jar" with WINZIP or Winrar program.

Should have left the jar file as it was and made a separate folder for your custom textures, not the other way around.

Win7/Vista
C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\

XP
C:\Documents and Settings\%username%\Application Data\.minecraft\

I added a mod to server to prevent TNT and LAVA from destroying things, its to prevent griefing on the server.

You don't want someone logging into your server and blowing up everything you build.

type /help for list of commands.
/time day

And spawn area is Protected yes, only ADMIN can edit spawn area.

Found the BUG, don't use 127.0.0.1, no one will be able to log in lol.

Use your server IP to log into.

Works fine, tested it on my laptop and desktop PC.

Also KIT.txt needs to be adjusted.

If Player, Player, Player logs into game.

They can only use 1 kit very 5min.

So just remove the time on it.

Also other way would be change user name when logging into server, but that don't work anymore.
